article: Mrs. Peter works in a bank. She has two children-Sammy and Annie. Sammy is  _  8-year-old boy. His sister Annie is four. Sammy goes to the  _  near his home and studies hard. When Sammy stays at home, he often  _  games with Annie while Mrs. Peter is busy doing housework. Sammy loves his sister very much and he is usually  _  to her,  _  sometimes something unhappy may happen. One Saturday morning, Sammy and Annie were playing in the garden. Their mother was  _  . Suddenly Annie began to cry and ran into the kitchen with a  _  toy horse. Mrs. Peter asked, "  _  are you crying. Annie?" "Sammy did it." Annie answered, crying loudly. "How did he break it?" her mother asked. Annie  _  crying, but did not answer for a few seconds. Then she said, "I  _  him on the head with it." Hearing this, Mrs. Peter understood the whole thing.
